content: both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **japanese version available here 1 ** calls for japanese size 3/0 2 3 mm hook gauge for the net stitch is listed as 6 5 peaks and 13 row in 10x10 cm it also says that one crochet motif should be 28x28 cm previously released as item 27-7 2 1 http //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/28-21/ 2 http //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/27-7/
